quote: He couldn't be more than forty-five, but Murray Miles was stooped, old before his time. The mountains of Alberta had the ability to bend those who lived here.That, or it broke them.
quote_letters: HE COULDNT BE MORE THAN FORTY-FIVE BUT MURRAY MILES WAS STOOPED OLD BEFORE HIS TIME THE MOUNTAINS OF ALBERTA HAD THE ABILITY TO BEND THOSE WHO LIVED HERETHAT OR IT BROKE THEM
